questions.text: Which data structure is best suited for implementing a LIFO (Last In, First Out) system?
questions.explanation: A stack operates on the principle of Last In, First Out (LIFO).

questions.text: In Python, what is the correct syntax for defining a function?
questions.explanation: Python uses the 'def' keyword to define functions.

questions.text: What is the time complexity of a binary search algorithm?
questions.explanation: Binary search operates in O(log n) time complexity by dividing the search space in half with each iteration.

questions.text: Which of these languages is primarily used for web development?
questions.explanation: HTML is a markup language used to create web pages.

questions.text: Which keyword in Java is used to create a new object?
questions.explanation: In Java, 'new' is used to instantiate objects.

questions.text: What is the primary purpose of the 'for' loop in programming?
options: B. To execute code while a condition is true
C. To execute code a specific number of times
questions.correctAnswer: C. To execute code a specific number of times
questions.explanation: The 'for' loop is often used when the number of iterations is known.

questions.text: Which of the following is a characteristic of a linked list?
questions.explanation: Linked lists allow sequential access to their elements.

questions.text: Which sorting algorithm has the best average-case time complexity?
questions.explanation: Merge sort has an average-case time complexity of O(n log n), which is efficient compared to other algorithms listed.

questions.text: Which HTTP method is used to update a resource on the server?
questions.explanation: The PUT method is commonly used to update a resource on the server.

questions.text: What will be the output of the following Python code: print(3 * 'hello')?
questions.explanation: In Python, multiplying a string by a number repeats the string.

questions.text: What data structure uses LIFO (Last In, First Out) order?
questions.explanation: A stack follows the Last In, First Out principle.

questions.text: What keyword in Python is used to define a function?
questions.explanation: The 'def' keyword is used to declare functions in Python.

questions.text: Which programming language is known for use in web browsers?
questions.explanation: JavaScript is widely used for client-side web development.

questions.text: What keyword in Java is used to create an instance of an object?
questions.explanation: The 'new' keyword in Java is used to instantiate objects.

questions.text: Which sorting algorithm has the best average-case time complexity?
questions.explanation: MergeSort has an average time complexity of O(n log n).

questions.text: What protocol is commonly used to transfer web pages?
questions.explanation: HTTP, or HyperText Transfer Protocol, is used to transfer web pages.

questions.text: What symbol is used to comment a line in Python?
questions.explanation: The '#' symbol is used for single-line comments in Python.

questions.text: What acronym represents a type of unique identifier in databases?
questions.explanation: UUID stands for Universally Unique Identifier, commonly used in databases.

questions.text: What is the term for a blueprint of an object in OOP?
questions.explanation: A class defines the structure and behavior of objects in object-oriented programming.

questions.text: What keyword is used in Java to inherit from a superclass?
questions.explanation: The 'extends' keyword in Java indicates that a class is inheriting from a superclass.

questions.text: What data type represents true or false values?
questions.explanation: The Boolean data type is used in SQL to store true or false values.
